info.description: API documentation for the DJJS Event Reporting Backend.
info.title: DJJS Event Reporting API

get.description: Retrieve an area by its name, or all areas if no name is provided.
get.summary: Get areas by name (or all if none provided)

post.description: Adds a new infrastructure entry for a branch
post.summary: Create a new branch infrastructure record

get.description: Fetch all infrastructure entries for a specific branch
get.summary: Get infrastructure records for a branch

put.description: Update existing infrastructure entry by ID

delete.description: Delete an infrastructure entry by ID

get.description: Retrieve branches by name and/or coordinator name, or list all if no filters.
get.summary: Get branches by name or coordinator (or all if none provided)

post.description: Create a new record in EventMedia table

get.description: Get all Event Media records for a specific Event ID
get.summary: Get Event Media by Event ID

put.description: Update an EventMedia record by ID

delete.description: Delete a record by ID from EventMedia

get.summary: Get special guest by event ID

post.description: Create a new record in PromotionMaterialDetails table

get.description: Get all Promotion Material Details records for a specific Event ID
get.summary: Get Promotion Material Details by Event ID

put.description: Update a PromotionMaterialDetails record by ID

delete.description: Delete a record by ID from PromotionMaterialDetails

post.description: Create user with auto-generated password (returned in response)

get.description: Retrieve users based on provided filters (email, contact number, or both).
get.summary: Search users by email or contact number

post.description: Authenticate user using email and password
post.summary: Login user and return JWT token

post.description: Clears user's token and ends session
